newsitem.title: USA: IBM, Rational to create modeling standard.
newsitem.headline: IBM, Rational to create modeling standard.

text.p: International Business Machines Corp, ObjecTime Ltd, and Rational Software Corp said Wednesday they agreed to create an industry-standard visual modeling language.
The standard, which would simplify application design, would define common semantics, notations and interfaces for developers to use in creating and manipulating graphical software applications.
The companies said the revised Unified Modeling Language (UML) proposal will merge an earlier proposal from IBM and ObjecTime with the proposed standard developed by Rational and its partners.
Platinum Technology Inc said in a separate release it would join Rational Software as a co-submitter in a partnership that will produce a proposal for an industry standard modeling language.
